mapper.select: SELECT UR.USER_ID userId, R.ROLE_ID roleId, R.ROLE_NAME roleName, R.ROLE_TYPE roleType, R.CREATION_DATE creationDate, R.CREATED_BY createdBy, R.LAST_UPDATE_DATE lastUpdateDate, R.LAST_UPDATED_BY lastUpdatedBy FROM ROLE R, USER_ROLE UR WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UR.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID AND R.STATUS = 1
